identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

heading.usage: All headings (h1-h6), Hero text, KPI numbers

rules: Overlines/Labels must be uppercase, text-xs, tracking-widest (0.1em)
Body text should never be pure black (#000000). Use Slate-700 or Slate-800

job_tracker_kanban.column_classes: min-w-[300px] w-[350px] flex flex-col gap-4 bg-slate-50/50 rounded-xl p-4 border border-slate-100

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200 rounded-full px-6
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:text-slate-900 transition-all rounded-full px-6

cards.job_card: bg-white border border-slate-100 rounded-xl p-5 hover:border-blue-200 hover:shadow-lg transition-all duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden
cards.kpi_card: bg-white border border-slate-100 rounded-xl p-6 flex flex-col justify-between h-full

inputs.default: h-11 rounded-lg border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-100 focus:border-blue-500 transition-all bg-white

hero_section.usage: Landing page hero image or split-screen login

startup_office.usage: Startup search page header or background

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic 'SaaS Blue' gradients. Use solid colors or very subtle mesh gradients.
DO NOT use Inter for headings. Use Manrope.
DO NOT center align the app container. Use full width with max-w constraints.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA/WCAG AA).
Use 2-3x more padding than standard. White space is luxury.
Interactive elements must have hover, active, and focus states.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a React (JS) + FastAPI app. Follow the design system strictly. Use the provided image URLs for specific sections. Implement the 'Bento' grid for the dashboard and 'Kanban' for the tracker. Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Soft Utility' aesthetic (rounder, softer shadows). Update tailwind.config.js to use the specific font families and colors defined here.
